sentences.en: Annie: Absolutely. This is a real Chinese Kungfu Film.
sentences.cn: 安妮: 这还有假, 这是一部正宗的中国功夫片.

sentences.en: At last, the band saw, was a major customer, kungfu people live!
sentences.cn: 终于有带看了, 还是个大客户, 功夫不负有心人!

sentences.en: Bruce Lee publicized the Chinese Kungfu to the world.
sentences.cn: 李小龙向世界宣传了中国功夫.

sentences.en: For what reason her kungfu is better than yours?
sentences.cn: 为甚么她的功夫比你厉害那么多?

sentences.en: Hidden Weapon is the most cryptic stunt in Chinese Kungfu.
sentences.cn: 暗器在中国武术中要算是最神秘的绝技.

sentences.en: Hundreds gather here each night to watch kungfu dramas after their shifts.
sentences.cn: 每晚下班后都会有数百人聚集在这里观看武打片.

sentences.en: I was not a Kungfu master, I couldn't properly a sword!
sentences.cn: 我不是李小龙, 甚至连把剑都拿不好!

sentences.en: It was widely spread and had a great influence on Chinese kungfu.
sentences.cn: 历代名人辈出,影响极大,流传甚广.

sentences.en: It's not just monks drawn to the home of kungfu.
sentences.cn: 被吸引来到功夫之乡的可不只是僧侣.

sentences.en: Jacky Chan is often the leading man in some funny kungfu movies.
sentences.cn: 成龙经常在一些搞笑的功夫电影中担任男主角.

sentences.en: Kungfu. It is the best selling and most popular movie this year.
sentences.cn: 功夫. 它是今年最畅销,最受欢迎的电影.

sentences.en: Let's drop the subject. I hate kungfu, it's merely brutal violence.
sentences.cn: 我们不谈这个问题, 我讨厌功夫; 那纯粹是暴力.

sentences.en: New Kungfu Combat Game win a lot of money!
sentences.cn: 最新开发的功夫对打游戏,可以赚钱的,快来玩 啊 !

sentences.en: See, I can even knock down walls with my kungfu.
sentences.cn: 看见没, 我用我的功夫把墙都撞倒了.

sentences.en: See,I can even knock down walls with my kungfu.
sentences.cn: 看见没，我用我的功夫把墙都撞倒了

sentences.en: What are you doing here?I am practicing kungfu.
sentences.cn: 你在这儿干什么呢？ 我在练习功夫。

sentences.en: Whether it be in melodramas, comedies or kungfu movies, the popularity of women lead roles was unprecedented.
sentences.cn: 无论是在剧情片、喜剧片还是功夫片中，女影星主演的角色都前所未有地受欢迎。

sentences.en: Yeah. Are you interested in Chinese kungfu?
sentences.cn: 是的. 你对中国功夫感兴趣 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: an ancient Chinese fighting art in which you attack people with your hands and feet
